revised_title: Classification of Ferns Based on Sporangial Morphology
tldr: The author examines the morphology of spore-producing members in ferns and proposes a new classification system based on the structure of their sporangia. The study identifies four main groups: Simplices, Gradatse, Mixtae, and Leptosporangiate ferns. The author also discusses the biological advantages of these classifications and their relation to the evolution of ferns.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
